toc.value: 1. Change the Number of Records While Inserting

frontMatter.title: Spring Boot: Boost JPA Bulk Insert Performance by 100x
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: Here we see how we can boost the bulk insert performance using JPA to insert large number of records into a database

prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
